prompt:
# Business Requirements

Business Requirement: Display Employees by Department

Objective:
Allow the system to list all employees belonging to a specific department.

Functional Requirements:
1. Filter by Department
   - Users should be able to enter a department name (e.g., "Engineering", "HR").
   - The system should display all employees working in that department.

2. Display Details
   - For each matching employee, display their name, ID, and role.

Suggested Code Enhancements:
- Add a method `getEmployeesByDepartment(String department)` in the `EmployeeManager` class.
- Use this method in the main class to demonstrate filtering functionality.

public class EmployeeService {
    private List<Employee> employees = new ArrayList<>();

    public void addEmployee(Employee employee) {
        employees.add(employee);
    }

    public List<Employee> getAllEmployees() {
        return employees;
    }
}

package com.company.app;

import com.company.model.Employee;
import com.company.service.EmployeeService;

public class Main {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        EmployeeService service = new EmployeeService();
        service.addEmployee(new Employee(1, "Alice", "HR"));
        service.addEmployee(new Employee(2, "Bob", "IT"));

        for (Employee e : service.getAllEmployees()) {
            System.out.println(e);
        }
    }
}
